content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status: NO_FUEL; warning: "out of fuel"; furnace_source holds 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status: NO_INGREDIENTS; warning: "no ingredients to smelt"; fuel inventory contains coal (2 units) and furnace_result holds 6 copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science packs; status: NO_POWER; electrical_id: 6008.
- ElectricityGroup with id=6008 connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5) and (8.5, 6.5) with voltage 0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(2.5, 21.5) for power generation; status: NOT_CONNECTED; warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"]; connection points: (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) for steam production; status: NO_FUEL; warning: "out of fuel"; fluid_box holds ~200 units of water at 15°; connection points: (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); steam output point: (-7.5, 24.5); fluid_system: [21436].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water extraction; status: WORKING; connection point: (-9.5, 23.5); fluid_box holds 100 units of water at 15°; fluid_system: [21436].
- Pipeline Network comprising:
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=21436 at position(-6.5, 20.5); status: WORKING.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=21437 at position(-2.5, 20.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=21438 at position(-0.5, 21.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=21443 at position(-3.5, 23.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=21442 at position(-7.5, 25.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=21447 at position(3.5, 25.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=21446 at position(2.5, 24.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=21449 at position(-0.5, 28.5); status: EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• Repeated Fluid System Connection Failures:
   - Multiple connection attempts using PipeGroups with fluid_system IDs [21092, 21135, 21178, 21221, 21264, 21307, 21350, 21393] resulted in no active PipeGroup being found. Verify that the fluid_system ID specified corresponds to an active and properly configured PipeGroup before initiating connection operations.
   
• Fixed Delay Limitations for Pipeline Stabilization:
   - Using a fixed 10-second delay after connection attempts has not ensured pipeline stability. Implement dynamic readiness checks to confirm pipeline stabilization prior to retrying connection operations.
